verses.arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۖ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Yusabbihu lillahi ma fi as-samawati wa ma fi al-ardi lahu al-mulku wa lahu al-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadir
verses.translation: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah. To Him belongs dominion, and to Him belongs [all] praise, and He is over all things competent

verses.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِي خَلَقَكُمْ فَمِنكُمْ كَافِرٌ وَمِنكُم مُّؤْمِنٌ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Huwa alladhi khalaqakum fa-minkum kafirun wa minkum mu'minun wa allahu bima ta'maluna basir
verses.translation: It is He who created you, and among you is the disbeliever, and among you is the believer. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing

verses.arabic: خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِالْحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمْ فَأَحْسَنَ صُورَكُمْ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Khalaqa as-samawati wa al-arda bi-al-haqqi wa sawwarakum fa-ahsana suwarakum wa ilayhi al-masir
verses.translation: He created the heavens and earth in truth and formed you and perfected your forms; and to Him is the [final] destination

verses.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
verses.transliteration: Ya'lamu ma fi as-samawati wa al-ardi wa ya'lamu ma tusirruna wa ma tu'linun wa allahu 'alimun bi-dhati as-sudur
verses.translation: He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَبَأُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِن قَبْلُ فَذَاقُوا وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Alam ya'tikum naba'u alladhina kafaru min qablu fa-dhaqu wabala amrihim wa lahum 'adhabun alim
verses.translation: Has there not come to you the news of those who disbelieved before? So they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُ كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُهُم بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرٌ يَهْدُونَنَا فَكَفَرُوا وَتَوَلَّوا ۚ وَاسْتَغْنَى اللَّهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٌ
verses.transliteration: Dhalika bi-annahu kanat ta'tihim rusuluhum bi-al-bayyinati fa-qalu abasharun yahdunana fa-kafaru wa tawallaw wa-staghna allahu wa allahu ghaniyyun hamid
verses.translation: That is because their messengers were coming to them with clear evidences, but they said, "Shall human beings guide us?" and disbelieved and turned away. And Allah dispensed [with them]; and Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy

verses.arabic: زَعَمَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا أَن لَّن يُبْعَثُوا ۚ قُلْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّي لَتُبْعَثُنَّ ثُمَّ لَتُنَبَّؤُنَّ بِمَا عَمِلْتُمْ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Za'ama alladhina kafaru an lan yub'athu qul bala wa rabbi la-tub'athunna thumma la-tunabba'unna bima 'amiltum wa dhalika 'ala allahi yasir
verses.translation: Those who disbelieve have claimed that they will never be resurrected. Say, "Yes, by my Lord, you will surely be resurrected; then you will surely be informed of what you did. And that, for Allah, is easy"

verses.arabic: فَآمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَالنُّورِ الَّذِي أَنزَلْنَا ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Fa-aminu billahi wa rasulihi wa an-nuri alladhi anzanna wa allahu bima ta'maluna khabir
verses.translation: So believe in Allah and His Messenger and the light which We have sent down. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَجْمَعُكُمْ لِيَوْمِ الْجَمْعِ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ التَّغَابُنِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِن بِاللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَالِحًا يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِ وَيُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yajma'ukum li-yawmi al-jam'i dhalika yawmu at-taghabuni wa man yu'min billahi wa ya'mal salihan yukaffir 'anhu sayyi'atihi wa yudkhilhu jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidin fiha abadan dhalika al-fawzu al-'azim
verses.translation: The Day He will assemble you for the Day of Assembly - that is the Day of Deprivation. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove from him his misdeeds and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Wa alladhina kafaru wa kaththabu bi-ayatina ula'ika ashabu an-nari khalidin fiha wa bi'sa al-masir
verses.translation: But those who disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of the Fire, abiding eternally therein; and wretched is the destination

verses.arabic: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِن بِاللَّهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Ma asaba min musibatin illa bi-idhni allahi wa man yu'min billahi yahdi qalbahu wa allahu bi-kulli shay'in 'alim
verses.translation: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. And Allah is Knowing of all things

verses.arabic: وَأَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا الرَّسُولَ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.transliteration: Wa ati'u allaha wa ati'u ar-rasula fa-in tawallaytum fa-innama 'ala rasulina al-balaghu al-mubin
verses.translation: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon Our Messenger is only [the duty of] clear notification

verses.arabic: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa huwa wa 'ala allahi fa-liyatawakkali al-mu'minun
verses.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him. And upon Allah let the believers rely

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِنَّ مِنْ أَزْوَاجِكُمْ وَأَوْلَادِكُمْ عَدُوًّا لَّكُمْ فَاحْذَرُوهُمْ ۚ وَإِن تَعْفُوا وَتَصْفَحُوا وَتَغْفِرُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu inna min azwajikum wa awladikum 'aduwwan lakum fa-ihdharuhum wa in ta'fu wa tasfahu wa taghfiru fa-inna allaha ghafurun rahim
verses.translation: O you who have believed, indeed, among your wives and your children are enemies to you, so beware of them. But if you pardon and overlook and forgive - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا أَمْوَالُكُمْ وَأَوْلَادُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عِندَهُ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Innama amwalukum wa awladukum fitnatun wa allahu 'indahu ajrun 'azim
verses.translation: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward

verses.arabic: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُمْ وَاسْمَعُوا وَأَطِيعُوا وَأَنفِقُوا خَيْرًا لِّأَنفُسِكُمْ ۗ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِ فَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: Fa-ittaqu allaha ma istata'tum wa isma'u wa ati'u wa anfiqu khayran li-anfusikum wa man yuqa shuhha nafsihi fa-ula'ika humu al-muflihun
verses.translation: So fear Allah as much as you are able and listen and obey and spend [in the way of Allah]; it is better for yourselves. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful

verses.arabic: إِن تُقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَاعِفْهُ لَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: In tuqridu allaha qardan hasanan yuda'ifhu lakum wa yaghfir lakum wa allahu shakurun halim
verses.translation: If you loan Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Appreciative and Forbearing
[He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Wise
